landing.title: What Happens When Creativity Meets Strategy — Only with Branding Hours!
landing.subtitle: #BuiltByBrandingHours
landing.description: Because every brand deserves its prime time.

process.title: THE PROCESS
process.subtitle: Where Strategy Meets Spark, And Magic Happens on Repeat.

steps.question: 01. You Discovered Us ✨
steps.answer: You searched for something awesome — and Google led you right to us. Guess the algorithm knows good taste when it sees it 😉

steps.question: 02. We Popped Up on Your Feed 👀
steps.answer: Maybe it was a thumb-stopping ad on Instagram, Facebook, or YouTube. (Yeah, we make those kinds of ads — for us and our clients!)

steps.question: 03. You Heard the Buzz 🔥
steps.answer: Someone who's worked with Branding Hours couldn't keep it to themselves. Our work speaks loud — and our clients even louder.

vision.title: Our Vision
content: At Branding Hours, we see a world where every local brand has the power to go global.
A world where creativity isn't just seen — it's felt, shared, and remembered.
We exist to turn bold ideas into brands people believe in.
To bridge the gap between dreams and digital growth.
To make every second of your brand's journey — its hour to shine.
Because the future belongs to brands that dare to stand out.
And we're here to make sure yours does — brilliantly. 🌍✨

callToAction.subtitle: We've Got the Strategy. You've Got the Story. Let's Build It Together.
